attributes.action: Make GP's have to have face to face appointments!
attributes.additional_details: Doctors are on a huge wage, they did not have to see people through the pandemic, only telephone diagnosis, where some have been misdiagnosed and will now die or face consequences! Shop workers had to see loads of people right through this pandemic and are still working. If the doctors don't want face to face appointments then put them on minimum wage and give the difference to the shop workers who have been there throughout this all! No one ever died because the shop ran out of toilet roll!
attributes.background:
If GP's still don't want to do face to face appointments, then reduce their wage and give the difference to shop workers, who have had to deal with face to face right through this pandemic (On minimum wage) 
For the record...I am am not a shop worker!

rejection.details: Decisions relating to GP appointments, including decisions on whether face-to-face appointments are appropriate, are operational matters for the NHS and individual GPs, not the UK Government or Parliament.
